author: janstey
msg: CAMEL-939 - Disable ruby script tests on IBM JDK. See JRUBY-3073 for more details.
I didn't disable ruby scripting in the runtime just in case a future jruby dependency
fixes the issue (basically didn't ewant to cripple camel is any way).

author: elecharny
msg: Removed the useless inner Invokedtask interface, and renamed the InvokedTaskImpl to InvokedTask.

author: sobryan
msg: PORTLETBRIDGE-51 : State is lost at random and postback request is deal as new one

Added Myfaces request attributes to excluded attributes list.  One such attribute "jsf_sequence" caused Myfaces to restore the state based on the value of this attribute vs. what was in the request -- this caused the app to revert to a prior view on things like refresh.
